history.title: Our Story
history.description: Unictava was born from a passion for technological innovation and a vision to transform how companies use immersive technologies. Our journey began with a deep curiosity about the potential of 3D and virtual reality, combined with continuous exploration of cutting-edge solutions. With years of experience in the sector and constant learning in modeling and programming, we have built a solid foundation of competencies that allows us to deliver exceptional results to our clients. Today, Unictava is recognized as a trusted partner for companies seeking to integrate the most advanced technologies into their processes.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team is composed of highly qualified professionals, each with specific skills in their area. The combination of creativity, technical abilities, and dedication is what allows us to deliver innovative and high-quality projects for our clients. We are more than a team: we are a group of enthusiasts working together to transform ideas into reality.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Unictava's mission is to bring cutting-edge 3D technologies to corporate and institutional realities, transforming innovation into concrete and tangible results. We are dedicated to facilitating the adoption of immersive solutions and sector-specific artificial intelligence, customized to meet the specific needs of our clients. Whether in simulations, training, or assistance through intelligent avatars, our goal is always to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' operations while reducing operational costs.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Unictava's mission is to bring cutting-edge 3D technologies to corporate and institutional realities, transforming innovation into concrete and tangible results. We are dedicated to facilitating the adoption of immersive solutions and sector-specific artificial intelligence, customized to meet the specific needs of our clients. Whether in simulations, training, or assistance through intelligent avatars, our goal is always to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' operations while reducing operational costs.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We are constantly seeking new ways to elevate technology to higher levels, exploring the latest frontiers of AI and 3D.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We ensure excellent results, with attention to detail in all phases of the project, from conception to final implementation.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We believe in clear and honest communication with our clients, building relationships based on trust and lasting collaboration.

future.title: Current and Future Purpose
future.description: Unictava's current focus is to remain at the forefront of the 3D technology sector, <highlight1>expanding our services</highlight1> and continuing to innovate in the fields of <highlight2>virtual reality</highlight2>, <highlight3>artificial intelligence</highlight3>, and <highlight4>immersive simulations</highlight4>. <highlight5>We look to the future with the goal</highlight5> to consolidate our position as <highlight6>industry leaders</highlight6> and <highlight7>continue to offer solutions that transform business realities</highlight7>.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: What are the technical requirements to implement VR and AR solutions?
faq.answer1: Requirements vary depending on project complexity, but generally require a platform with 3D rendering capability and support for AI technologies such as NLP and machine learning.
faq.question2: Can 3D avatars be integrated with existing systems?
faq.answer2: Yes, our avatars are designed to easily integrate with most CRM systems, e-learning platforms, and websites.
faq.question3: What is the average implementation time?
faq.answer3: Implementation time varies depending on project complexity, but typically takes between 4 to 12 weeks for a complete solution.

hero.title: Custom Artificial Intelligence for Companies
hero.description: We transform your organization's knowledge into a precise, secure and ready-to-use AI system. UnicTava develops tailor-made Artificial Intelligence solutions for businesses of all sizes. We train the AI using your own documents, procedures, PDFs, manuals, videos and internal materials — ensuring accurate, consistent and industry-specific responses.

whatItDoes.title: What can our AI do?
whatItDoes.item1Title: AI trained with your company's content
whatItDoes.item1Text: It learns exactly what you provide: procedures, internal rules, methodologies, educational content and much more.
whatItDoes.item2Text: Our technology is not tied to a single field. It adapts to:
whatItDoes.item4Text: For large volumes of knowledge or heavy workflows, we use multiple agents for faster and more stable performance.
whatItDoes.item5Text: Add new training materials whenever needed. Your AI grows as your company evolves.

advantages.title: Key Advantages
advantages.item2Text: Faster decisions and reduced research time.
advantages.item3Text: Less repetition, fewer errors, greater productivity.
advantages.item4Text: The AI reflects your company's identity and processes.
advantages.item5Text: Accessible on any device, at any time.
advantages.item6Text: Can run locally or in a secure cloud environment.
advantages.item7Text: Works in Portuguese, Italian, English, Spanish, French and more.
advantages.item9Text: Compatible with internal systems and learning platforms.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: Large language models trained specifically with your company's content and expertise.
technologies.item2Text: Multiple AI agents working together to accelerate responses and manage large volumes of information.
technologies.item3Text: Advanced vectorization technology enabling deep semantic search and contextual understanding of extensive documents.
technologies.item4Text: Intelligent indexing and automatic content categorization systems for optimized retrieval.
technologies.item5Text: Realistic virtual characters that humanize interaction and make the experience more immersive and natural.
technologies.item6Text: Flexible deployment: secure cloud hosting or local installation in your company's infrastructure for maximum privacy.
technologies.item7Text: Intuitive dashboards to manage, update and monitor AI performance in real-time.
technologies.item8Text: Flexible architecture that grows with your company, allowing you to add features and content without rebuilding.

projects.title: Example Projects Delivered
projects.item1Text: Assists students, answers questions and explains content clearly.
projects.item2Text: Searches regulations, explains procedures and supports technical teams.
projects.item3Text: Improves onboarding, standardizes processes and reduces repetitive questions.
projects.item4Text: Supports procedures, internal guidelines and fiscal documentation.
projects.item5Text: Organizes protocols, training materials and specialized information.
projects.item6Text: Explains services, protocols, itineraries and operational procedures.
projects.item7Text: AI system used for internal training, answering technical questions and supporting teams.
projects.item8Text: Used in immersive courses with animated explanations and natural interaction.
projects.item9Text: Trained with regulations and internal documents, delivering fast and reliable answers to legal teams.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: How long does it take to train the AI?
faq.answer1: Between 3 and 15 days, depending on the content volume.
faq.question2: Can the AI be updated later?
faq.answer2: Yes. More content can be added at any time.
faq.answer3: Absolutely. Choose between local hosting or secure cloud infrastructure.
faq.answer4: Yes, it can be trained to operate in several languages.
faq.answer6: No. It supports and enhances processes but does not replace specialists.
faq.question7: Can any type of company use this?
faq.answer7: Yes. Just provide the content for training.

cta.title: Ready to transform your company's knowledge into a powerful intelligent system?
cta.subtitle: Contact us and tell us about your project. We build a fully personalized AI solution for your needs.

hero.title: Bring your stories to life with our extraordinary 3D Cinematics.
hero.description: Whether creating fully digital characters or integrating real footage with 3D environments and effects, we offer cutting-edge cinematic solutions for every project.

advantages.title: Specific Advantages
advantages.item1Text: We create incredibly realistic 3D characters that can perform in your stories naturally and precisely.
advantages.item2Text: Combine reality with fantasy, integrating real footage with 3D effects to create stunning and immersive scenes.
advantages.item3Text: Our 3D cinematics adapt to any creative need, improving engagement and creating unforgettable experiences.
advantages.item4Text: We use the most advanced technologies to ensure maximum visual and interactive quality.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: Motion capture technologies to create realistic and fluid animations.
technologies.item2Text: We use advanced rendering software to generate high-quality visual effects in real-time.
technologies.item3Text: Advanced computer graphics to create detailed environments and characters.
technologies.item4Text: Compositing techniques to seamlessly integrate 3D elements with real footage.

projects.title: Examples of Completed Projects
projects.item1Text: Creation of music videos with digital characters and immersive 3D environments, enhancing the visual and narrative experience.
projects.item2Text: Production of commercials combining real and digital elements to capture audience attention.
projects.item3Text: Production of films and short films with 3D special effects that elevate the quality of visual storytelling.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The 3D Cinematics solutions transformed my project. The digital characters were so realistic that the audience had difficulty distinguishing between real and virtual.
testimonials.item2Text: The integration of 3D effects in our commercials increased engagement and made our ads truly memorable.

faq.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faq.question1: How long does it take to create a 3D cinematic?
faq.answer1: Production time varies according to project complexity. Contact us for a personalized estimate.
faq.question2: What are the costs associated with creating a 3D cinematic?
faq.answer2: Costs depend on project specifications, including the number of characters, effect complexity, and video duration. Request a quote for precise details.
faq.question3: Can I integrate 3D cinematics with my existing videos?
faq.answer3: Yes, we offer compositing services to seamlessly integrate 3D elements with existing real footage.

cta.title: Discover how our 3D Cinematics solutions can transform your business.
cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and request a personalized quote.

hero.title: Take your training and assessment to the next level with our cutting-edge 3D simulations.
hero.description: Designed for industries, training centers, and institutions, our simulations provide a safe and realistic environment to prepare users for real-world challenges.

advantages.title: Specific Advantages
advantages.item1Text: Our 3D simulations offer realistic scenarios that prepare users for real-world situations, improving training effectiveness.
advantages.item2Text: Measure user performance in real-time, accurately identifying strengths and areas for improvement.
advantages.item3Text: Customize simulations according to your organization's specific needs, adapting to different scenarios and learning objectives.
advantages.item4Text: Eliminate the need for expensive physical equipment and in-person training, significantly reducing operational costs.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: Creation of high-fidelity three-dimensional environments and objects for immersive simulations.
technologies.item2Text: Integration with VR devices for fully immersive and engaging experiences.
technologies.item3Text: Implementation of AI to create dynamic and adaptive scenarios that respond to user actions.
technologies.item4Text: Use of haptic technologies to provide realistic physical feedback during simulations.

projects.title: Examples of Completed Projects
projects.item1Text: Development of simulations for training heavy machinery operators, reducing risks and increasing workplace safety.
projects.item2Text: Creation of surgical simulations allowing doctors and students to practice complex procedures in a controlled, risk-free environment.
projects.item3Text: Combat and military strategy simulations to train soldiers in realistic and challenging tactical scenarios.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The 3D simulations transformed our training program. The ability to train operators in a safe virtual environment significantly reduced workplace accidents.
testimonials.item2Text: Students can now practice complex surgical procedures repeatedly until mastering them, something impossible with traditional teaching methods.

faq.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faq.question1: What equipment is needed to use the 3D simulations?
faq.answer1: Requirements vary depending on simulation type, but generally include a computer with adequate graphics capability and, optionally, VR devices for immersive experiences.
faq.question2: Can simulations be customized for our specific industry?
faq.answer2: Yes, all our simulations are fully customizable to meet the specific needs of different sectors and organizations.
faq.question3: How long does it take to develop a custom simulation?
faq.answer3: Development time varies according to project complexity. Contact us for a detailed estimate based on your specific needs.

cta.title: Discover how our 3D Simulation solutions can transform your business.
cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and request a personalized quote.

hero.title: Transform education and training with our immersive 3D solutions.
hero.description: Whether you're a public or private institution, we offer learning experiences that capture and maintain students' attention.

advantages.title: Specific Advantages
advantages.item1Text: Forget boring PDFs and PowerPoint presentations. Our 3D solutions make learning a visual and engaging adventure, facilitating content comprehension and memorization.
advantages.item2Text: Integrate virtual tutors to guide students through personalized learning paths, offering real-time support and clarifications.
advantages.item3Text: Our solutions are designed to adapt to any type of training, from school courses to corporate training programs, ensuring effective and interactive learning.
advantages.item4Text: The interactivity of our 3D solutions increases student engagement, making learning more interesting and productive.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: We use cutting-edge 3D graphics technologies to create realistic and engaging learning environments.
technologies.item2Text: Integration of VR and AR for immersive and interactive learning experiences.
technologies.item3Text: Implementation of AI to personalize learning paths and provide real-time feedback.
technologies.item4Text: Compatibility with major e-learning platforms for easy integration and course management.

projects.title: Examples of Completed Projects
projects.item1Text: Implementation of 3D environments for teaching science, history, and geography, improving student comprehension and interest.
projects.item2Text: Creation of immersive training modules for companies, improving information retention and employee preparation.
projects.item3Text: Development of university courses using virtual reality for practical simulations and interactive case studies.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The 3D solutions transformed how my students learn. The interactivity and immersion made classes much more engaging and memorable.
testimonials.item2Text: The 3D training significantly improved our employees' preparation. The interactive modules increased engagement and information retention.

faq.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faq.question1: What are the technical requirements to implement 3D solutions?
faq.answer1: Requirements vary according to project complexity, but generally require VR/AR compatible devices and e-learning platforms.
faq.question2: How long does it take to develop a 3D training module?
faq.answer2: Development time depends on project complexity and specifications. Contact us for a personalized estimate.
faq.question3: Can 3D solutions be integrated with our learning management systems (LMS)?
faq.answer3: Yes, our solutions are designed to easily integrate with major learning management systems.

cta.title: Discover how our 3D solutions can revolutionize your education and training.
cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and request a personalized quote.

hero.title: Bring your game ideas to life with our 3D game development solutions.
hero.description: Whether you're looking to create an indie game or support a major project, we offer cutting-edge expertise to create engaging, high-quality games.

advantages.title: Specific Advantages
advantages.item1Text: We create both multiplayer and single-player games, adapting to your project's needs to offer immersive and engaging gaming experiences.
advantages.item2Text: We develop games for PC, Android, virtual reality, and other platforms, ensuring maximum flexibility and accessibility.
advantages.item3Text: We offer complete development support, from programming to art. Our team includes specialists in 3D graphics, character and environment design, ensuring an extremely high-quality final result.
advantages.item4Text: We use the most advanced technologies to ensure each game is fluid, visually stunning, and highly interactive.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: We use game engines like Unreal Engine and Unity to develop high-quality games.
technologies.item2Text: Cutting-edge 3D rendering technologies to create detailed and realistic environments and characters.
technologies.item3Text: Implementation of AI to create intelligent and reactive NPCs (non-playable characters).
technologies.item4Text: Infrastructure to support online multiplayer games, including dedicated servers and matchmaking services.

projects.title: Examples of Completed Projects
projects.item1Text: Complete development of an indie game with an engaging storyline and detailed 3D graphics, available for PC and console.
projects.item2Text: Creation of an immersive VR game that fully leverages virtual reality capabilities for a unique gaming experience.
projects.item3Text: Development of a mobile multiplayer game with matchmaking features and real-time competition.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The team transformed my vision into an extraordinary game. The quality of the graphics and gameplay fluidity exceeded my expectations.
testimonials.item2Text: Thanks to their expertise, we managed to create an immersive VR game that was hugely successful among players. The collaboration was fantastic from start to finish.

faq.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faq.question1: How long does it take to develop a 3D game?
faq.answer1: Development time varies according to project complexity. It can range from a few months to a year or more for complex games.
faq.question2: What are the costs associated with developing a 3D game?
faq.answer2: Costs depend on project specifications, including gameplay complexity, level of graphic detail, and required features. Contact us for a detailed quote.
faq.question3: Can you support my game after launch?
faq.answer3: Yes, we offer post-launch support services, including updates, bug fixes, and ongoing improvements.

cta.title: Discover how our 3D Game Development solutions can turn your ideas into reality.
cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and request a personalized quote.

hero.title: Bring innovation to your hands with our virtual and augmented reality solutions.
hero.description: We offer immersive and mixed experiences for a wide range of applications, transforming your vision into reality.

advantages.title: Specific Advantages
advantages.item1Text: With our virtual reality (VR) solution, you can completely enter a virtual world, ideal for projects like interior design, where you can modify, position, and experience objects in a virtual environment.
advantages.item2Text: Combine the real world with virtual elements through augmented reality (AR). Perfect for construction site previews, where you can see how virtual elements integrate into the real environment using state-of-the-art augmented reality glasses.
advantages.item3Text: Our VR and AR solutions are highly versatile, suitable for training, simulations, games, and much more. We offer customized experiences to meet your project's specific needs.
advantages.item4Text: We use the most advanced technologies to create fluid and interactive experiences, ensuring each project is visually impressive and highly functional.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: We use platforms like Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, and Microsoft HoloLens to deliver high-quality immersive experiences.
technologies.item2Text: Cutting-edge 3D rendering technologies to create detailed and realistic environments and objects.
technologies.item3Text: Implementation of advanced tracking technologies and sensors for greater interactivity and precision.
technologies.item4Text: Integration of AI to improve interactivity and personalize the user experience.

projects.title: Examples of Completed Projects
projects.item1Text: Development of VR applications for interior design, allowing clients to visualize and modify environments in real-time.
projects.item2Text: Creation of AR solutions for project previews at construction sites, facilitating planning and implementation.
projects.item3Text: Implementation of VR simulations for medical training, allowing students to practice procedures in a safe and controlled environment.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The VR solutions revolutionized how we present our projects to clients. The ability to visualize and modify interiors in real-time greatly improved our efficiency and client satisfaction.
testimonials.item2Text: The integration of AR in our construction sites greatly facilitated project planning and execution. The precision and interactivity of AR solutions were a real game-changer.

faq.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
faq.question1: What are the technical requirements to implement VR and AR solutions?
faq.answer1: Requirements vary according to project complexity, but generally require VR/AR compatible devices and support software.
faq.question2: How long does it take to develop a VR or AR solution?
faq.answer2: Development time depends on project complexity and specifications. It can range from a few weeks to several months.
faq.question3: Can VR and AR solutions be integrated with our existing systems?
faq.answer3: Yes, our solutions are designed to easily integrate with existing systems and platforms.

cta.title: Discover how our VR and AR solutions can revolutionize your project.
cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and request a personalized quote.

privacyPolicy.metaDescription: UnicTava Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: This website collects personal data (name, email, phone) provided voluntarily by users through the quote form. Protecting your data is a priority for us, and this document explains how we handle your information.

section2.title: 2. Data Controller
section2.content: The controller responsible for the processing of personal data collected on this website is Rafael Tavares / UnicTava, headquartered at Via Montefeltro, 8/10, 20156 Milano MI, Italia.

section3.title: 3. Data Collected
section3.content: We collect the following information when you fill out our contact or quote form: Full name, Email address, Phone number (when voluntarily provided), Project type of interest, Message and project details, Attached files (when provided).

section4.title: 4. Purpose of Processing
section4.content: The collected data is used exclusively to respond to your quote and contact requests. We do not share your information with third parties without your explicit authorization, except when required by law.

section5.title: 5. Legal Basis and Storage
section5.content: The legal basis for processing your data is the explicit consent provided by checking the acceptance box on the form. Data is stored securely on our servers (Supabase) and kept only for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, generally up to 12 months.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section6.right1: Right of Access: request a copy of the data we hold about you
section6.right2: Right of Rectification: correct incorrect or incomplete data
section6.right3: Right to Erasure: request the deletion of your data
section6.right4: Right to Portability: receive your data in a structured format
section6.right5: Right to Lodge a Complaint: file a complaint with the competent data protection authority (Garante per la Protezione dei Dati Personali - Italy)

section7.title: 7. Retention Period
section7.content: Personal data will be kept for the time strictly necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected. After this period, the data will be deleted or anonymized. In general, we keep contact data for up to 12 months from the last interaction.

section8.title: 8. Data Security
section8.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration. However, no Internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section9.title: 9. Contact for Privacy Matters
section9.content: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about the processing of your personal data, contact us via email:

cookiePolicy.metaDescription: UnicTava Cookie Policy - Understand how we use cookies to improve your website experience
cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy

section1.title: 1. What are Cookies
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device when you visit them. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

section2.title: 2. Technical Cookies (Always Active)
section2.intro: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website and do not require your prior consent:

cookie1.name: Session Cookie
cookie1.description: Keeps your session active while you browse the website. Expires when you close your browser.

cookie2.name: Language Preference Cookie
cookie2.description: Stores your language preference (Portuguese, English, or Italian). Duration: 12 months.

cookie3.name: Consent Cookie
cookie3.description: Records your cookie choices. Duration: 12 months.

section3.title: 3. Analytics Cookies (Optional)
section3.intro: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website, always anonymously. They require your consent:

cookie1.name: Google Analytics (_ga, _ga_*)
cookie1.description: Used to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to compile reports and help us improve the website. The cookies collect information anonymously. Duration: 2 years.

cookie2.name: Third-party Cookies
cookie2.description: We may use third-party cookies for traffic analysis and user behavior.

section3.note: Important: According to Italian regulations (Garante per la Protezione dei Dati Personali), analytics and third-party cookies can only be activated after your explicit consent.

section4.title: 4. Cookie Management
section4.content1: When you access this website for the first time, you will see a consent banner where you can choose which cookie categories to accept. You can change your preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' link in the website footer.
section4.content2: You can also manage cookies directly in your browser settings. Consult your browser's help section for instructions on how to block or delete cookies.

section5.title: 5. Legal Basis
section5.content: As established by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the guidelines of the Italian Garante, we obtain your explicit consent before activating non-essential cookies. Your consent is valid for 12 months, after which we will request it again.

section6.title: 6. Duration and Renewal
section6.content: Cookie consent is valid for 12 months. After this period, we will request your consent again through the cookie banner.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For questions about our cookie policy and your choices, contact us via email:

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website or services.

section2.title: 2. Description of Services
section2.content: UnicTava offers specialized services in 3D technologies, including:

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content on this website, including texts, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the property of UnicTava or its content suppliers and is protected by Italian and international copyright laws.

section4.title: 4. Website Use
section4.intro: By using our website, you agree not to:
section4.prohibition1: Use the website in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the website
section4.prohibition2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website, servers, or connected networks
section4.prohibition3: Use the website for illegal or unauthorized purposes
section4.prohibition4: Violate any applicable laws in your jurisdiction

section5.title: 5. Forms and Quote Requests
section5.content1: Quote requests submitted through our form do not constitute a binding offer. All quotes are estimates subject to confirmation after detailed project analysis.
section5.content2: We reserve the right to refuse any quote request or project proposal at our sole discretion.
section5.content3: Timelines and costs mentioned in quotes are estimates and subject to formal confirmation through a written contract.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: UnicTava shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your access to or use of (or inability to access or use) this website or any content contained therein.

section7.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on this website. It is your responsibility to periodically review these terms.

section8.title: 8. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section8.content: These terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Italian Republic. Any dispute related to these terms will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Milan, Italy.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us via email:
